pest.description: When your lawn is bright and green, it is the most inviting part of your home. It loses its appeal quickly when it becomes brown and sick. Pests can be a major contributing factor to brown patches in your lawn. Our team offers to do a quick, but thorough, lawn inspection for a small fee if you believe your lawn may be under attack by pests. Below are a few of the most common pests that will leave your lawn in shambles.
